mapper.insert: INSERT seminar (course_id, round_id, seminar_name, introduction, max_team, is_visible, seminar_serial, enroll_start_time, enroll_end_time) VALUE (#{courseId}, #{roundId}, #{topic}, #{introduction}, #{maxTeamNum}, #{signOrder}, #{visible}, #{signStartTime}, #{signEndTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id as seminarId, round_id as roundId, seminar_name as topic, introduction as introduction, max_team as maxTeamNum, is_ordered as signOrder, is_visible as visible, enroll_start_date as signStartTime, enroll_end_date as signEndTime FROM seminar WHERE id = #{seminarId}
